publisher.publisher-name: Chinese Academy of Mathematices and System Sciences (AMSS) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: A NOTE ON THE QUADRILATERAL MESH CONDITION RDP(N, ψ)

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2007 AMSS, Chinese Academy of Sciences

abstract.p: The main aim of this paper is to show that the quadrilateral mesh condition RDP(N, ψ) is only sufficient but not necessary for the optimal order error estimate of the Q₁ isoparametric element in the H¹ norm.
